titleStmt.title: Folly and envy detected: in some brief observations on a late scandalous pamphlet, subscribed by D.S. intituled, An answer to several passages, citations and charges, in a book published by Fran. Bugg, styled, New Rome arraigned, &c. / By R. Bridgman.
titleStmt.author: Bridgman, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle, near the meeting:house in White-Hart-Court in Grace-Church-Street, and at the Crooked-Billet in Holywell-Lane near Shoreditch,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London, England.

place.placeName: the Crooked-Billet in Holywell-Lane near Shoreditch
the meeting:house in White-Hart-Court in Grace-Church-Street
